title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.5 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 6-2.5 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Subpart. (b) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, written copies of records will be furnished in
accordance with section
6-1.2
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
6-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
